mapper.select: select branch_name, depth from branch where his_check = '1'
select dept_name, d.depth from dept d join branch b on d.branch_no = b.branch_no where d.his_check = '1' and d.branch_name = #{branch_name}
select low_dept_name, l.depth from low_dept l join dept d on l.dept_no = d.dept_no where l.his_check = '1' and d.dept_name = #{dept_name}
select emp_no, emp_name from emp e join low_dept d on d.low_dept_no = e.low_dept_no where d.low_dept_name = #{low_dept_name}
